pageTwo.title: Matheus Olivieri
pageTwo.firstparagraph: Engineer by grad and developer by heart, I’ve been working in Australia’s IT industry for the past 4 years. Since the beggining of my journey as a developer, nearly 3 years ago, I’ve been working on personal projects. I’m naturally curious and confident that I can deliver a good code. I wish to continue to perpetually working on improving and learning new programming skills.
pageTwo.subtitle: When I’m not coding, you can find me
pageTwo.secondparagraph: playing bass with my band, watching soccer or, as a good Brazilian, in a barbecue with family and friends. I love traveling and being outside getting to know new people, but I’m also a huge fan of Netflix & chill days.

pageThree.title: Caixa de ferramentas
pageThree.content: As product owner I was deeply involved on DevOps processes and decisions. 2 years ago I started a personal project using Django for the backend and React for the frontend. I have always valued the importance of tests on my code, CD/CI and clean code. I have recently started an immersion on Node and Typescript and I love React and NextJs.

gullieWeb.description: In past few years, we see technology becoming more and more part of our day-to-day lives, including the hospitality industry, where you can look at online menus, order and pay thorugh a mobile device and in many cases, not interact with human sta . Having that in mind, the Gullie app comes with the goal to fill up the gap between people with disability and the new way of ordering.

gullieManager.description: Web based platform where venue owners can easily manage the content displayed on the online menu, from the dishes and its add ons, to configurate completely di erent menus to di erent times of the day.

gullieAdmin.description: ABC Web based platform where venue owners can easily manage the content displayed on the online menu, from the dishes and its add ons, to configurate completely di erent menus to di erent times of the day.

gullieAPI.description: DFG Web based platform where venue owners can easily manage the content displayed on the online menu, from the dishes and its add ons, to configurate completely di erent menus to di erent times of the day.
